Class PanelToImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • PanelToImage
  • public class PanelToImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Support code for writing JPanels out to image files DO NOT CAHNGE NO TEST IS NEEDED FOR THIS
    Version:
    October 26, 2017 Lab 10
    Author:
    Andrew H. Fagg

      • makePanelImage

        public static void makePanelImage​(java.awt.Component panel,
                                  java.lang.String fileName,
                                  java.lang.String fileType)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Write a JPanel out to an image file http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11272938/how-to-save-panel-as-image-in-swing
        Parameters:
        panel - Panel to write out to a file
        fileName - Name of output file
        fileType - Type of image ("png")
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for attempting to write the image file
